title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Select 'Export Zip' from the menu. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose some file types. 5. Press 'OK'.
